main event: On October 23, 1954, a military personnel observed an unidentified flying object in Merced, California. The object was approximately 40 feet in diameter, round in shape, of metallic appearance, and it hovered for a few minutes before accelerating and disappearing with no trail left behind.
interesting points: The report was received from the 23rd Bomb Wing, Castle Air Force Base, California.
The object was described as round, approximately 40 feet in diameter, and of metallic appearance.
It hovered for a few minutes before accelerating and disappearing with no trail left behind.
The observer was impressed by the unusual speed of the object, and it was compared to the sound of air under high pressure.
Visual sightings of a similar nature in the Merced area had been reported for the past 6 months, indicating that this sighting was not an isolated occurrence.
sighted object: unidentified, approximately 40 feet in diameter, with metallic appearance
witnesses: military personnel, large number of civilians
